name: Matrix.finiteDimensional
initialProofState:
m : Type u_1
n : Type u_2
R : Type v
inst✝² : Field R
inst✝¹ : Finite m
inst✝ : Finite n
⊢ FiniteDimensional R (Matrix m n R)
decl:
instance finiteDimensional [Finite m] [Finite n] : FiniteDimensional R (Matrix m n R) :=
  Module.Finite.matrix

name: LinearMap.finiteDimensional
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝⁶ : Field K
V : Type u_2
inst✝⁵ : AddCommGroup V
inst✝⁴ : Module K V
inst✝³ : FiniteDimensional K V
W : Type u_3
inst✝² : AddCommGroup W
inst✝¹ : Module K W
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional K W
⊢ FiniteDimensional K (LinearMap (RingHom.id K) V W)
decl:
instance finiteDimensional : FiniteDimensional K (V →ₗ[K] W) :=
  Module.Finite.linearMap _ _ _ _

name: LinearMap.finiteDimensional'
initialProofState:
K : Type u_1
inst✝¹² : Field K
V : Type u_2
inst✝¹¹ : AddCommGroup V
inst✝¹⁰ : Module K V
inst✝⁹ : FiniteDimensional K V
W : Type u_3
inst✝⁸ : AddCommGroup W
inst✝⁷ : Module K W
inst✝⁶ : FiniteDimensional K W
A : Type u_4
inst✝⁵ : Ring A
inst✝⁴ : Algebra K A
inst✝³ : Module A V
inst✝² : IsScalarTower K A V
inst✝¹ : Module A W
inst✝ : IsScalarTower K A W
⊢ FiniteDimensional K (LinearMap (RingHom.id A) V W)
decl:
/-- Linear maps over a `k`-algebra are finite dimensional (over `k`) if both the source and
target are, as they form a subspace of all `k`-linear maps. -/
instance finiteDimensional' : FiniteDimensional K (V →ₗ[A] W) :=
  FiniteDimensional.of_injective (restrictScalarsₗ K A V W K) (restrictScalars_injective _)
